original_title: 風紀委員長のお仕事。 001 鈴村あいり
overview: The young Japanese generation is out of control and lack of morals and values. But not to worry, Airi Suzumura becomes school Disciplinary Committee Director, her job: To straighten out everybody, enforce very strict school rules in order to achieve perfect morals and honor, for everybody.  We live in a world with very tight moral rules and Suzumura-chan is there to enforce. Except, she might get out of line too…  As a fun fact, by the end of this movie the students have enough of Suzumura crap, and they gangrape her + bukkake her in the face… she doesn’t seem to mind…
title: The Job Of The Disciplinary Committee Director 001. Airi Suzumura
